36#include <config.h>
37
38#include <stdlib.h>
39#ifdef HAVE_UNISTD_H
40#include <unistd.h>
41#endif
42#ifdef HAVE_SYS_TYPES_H
43#include <sys/types.h>
44#endif
45
46#if 0 /* Where were those needed? /confused */
47#ifdef HAVE_SYS_PROC_H
48#include <sys/proc.h>
49#endif
50
51#ifdef HAVE_SYS_TTY_H
52#include <sys/tty.h>
53#endif
54#endif
55
56#ifdef HAVE_TERMIOS_H
57#include <termios.h>
58#endif
59
60#include <krb5/roken.h>
61
62ROKEN_LIB_FUNCTION int ROKEN_LIB_CALL
63get_window_size(int fd, int *lines, int *columns)
64{
65 char *s;
66
67#if defined(TIOCGWINSZ)
68 {
69 struct winsize ws;
70 int ret;
71 ret = ioctl(fd, TIOCGWINSZ, &ws);
72 if (ret != -1) {
73 if (lines)
74 *lines = ws.ws_row;
75 if (columns)
76 *columns = ws.ws_col;
77 return 0;
78 }
79 }
80#elif defined(TIOCGSIZE)
81 {
82 struct ttysize ts;
83 int ret;
84 ret = ioctl(fd, TIOCGSIZE, &ts);
85 if (ret != -1) {
86 if (lines)
87 *lines = ts.ws_lines;
88 if (columns)
89 *columns = ts.ts_cols;
90 return 0;
91 }
92 }
93#elif defined(HAVE__SCRSIZE)
94 {
95 int dst[2];
96
97 _scrsize(dst);
98 if (lines)
99 *lines = dst[1];
100 if (columns)
101 *columns = dst[0];
102 return 0;
103 }
104#elif defined(_WIN32)
105 {
106 intptr_t fh = 0;
107 CONSOLE_SCREEN_BUFFER_INFO sb_info;
108
109 fh = _get_osfhandle(fd);
110 if (fh != (intptr_t) INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE &&
111 GetConsoleScreenBufferInfo((HANDLE) fh, &sb_info)) {
112 if (lines)
113 *lines = 1 + sb_info.srWindow.Bottom - sb_info.srWindow.Top;
114 if (columns)
115 *columns = 1 + sb_info.srWindow.Right - sb_info.srWindow.Left;
116
117 return 0;
118 }
119 }
120#endif
121 if (columns) {
122 if ((s = getenv("COLUMNS")))
123 *columns = atoi(s);
124 else
125 return -1;
126 }
127 if (lines) {
128 if ((s = getenv("LINES")))
129 *lines = atoi(s);
130 else
131 return -1;
132 }
133 return 0;
134}
135
